tetra.improvement.mana_repair.name: Mana repair
tetra.improvement.mana_repair.descriptio: The item will repair itself over time using mana
tetra.stats.manaRepair.tooltip: This item will use mana to repair itself over time, repairing one point of durability costs §e%s§r mana
tetra.material.feature.rootboon.tooltip:
Major modules crafted from ironwood gain an enchantment depending on the module type
 
§7As long as the enchantment doesn't conflict with any of the item's existing enchantments
tetra.material.feature.rootboon.tooltip_:
Enchantments are applied based on the following criteria:
 §7- Blunt/edged weapon AND Block breaker: §eFortune I
 §7- Block breaker: §eEfficiency I
 §7- Breakable: §eUnbreaking I
tetra.material.feature.leafboon.tooltip:
Major modules crafted from steeleaf gain an enchantment depending on the module type
 
§7As long as the enchantment doesn't conflict with any of the item's existing enchantments
tetra.material.feature.leafboon.tooltip_:
Enchantments are applied based on the following criteria:
 §7- Blunt/edged weapon AND Block breaker: §eEfficiency II
 §7- Block breaker: §eFortune II
 §7- Blunt/edged weapon: §eLooting II
tetra.material.feature.fiery_igniting.to: Major modules crafted with Fiery Ingots gain the §eIgniting§r or §eBlazing§r modifier depending on the module slot

Modules that one would hold gain the §eBlazing§7 modifier, like a handle, hilt or bow stave.
Modules that would typically hit a target gain the §eIgniting§7 modifier, like a blade or a tool head.
Using Fiery Ingots as a material for major modules that are used for breaking blocks gain the §eAuto-smelt§r modifier
tetra.improvement.fiery_igniting.name: Igniting
tetra.improvement.fiery_igniting.descrip: Hitting an entity sets it on fire
tetra.stats.igniting.tooltip: Hitting an entity sets it on fire for §e%s§r seconds
tetra.improvement.fiery_blazing.name: Blazing
tetra.improvement.fiery_blazing.descript: Using this item has a chance to set the wielder on fire
tetra.improvement.auto_smelt.name: Auto-smelt
tetra.improvement.auto_smelt.description: Breaking blocks automatically smelts the drops
tetra.stats.autoSmelt.tooltip: Breaking blocks automatically smelts the drops
tetra/schematic/shared/fiery_bond.name: Fiery bond
tetra/schematic/shared/fiery_bond.descri: Infuse the handle with the fiery essence of a Hydra or an Ur-ghast, providing ways to counteract or leverage the blazing effect depending on the essence used.
tetra/schematic/sword/knife.name: Knife
tetra/schematic/sword/knife.description: Craft a knife blade from the given materials. The knife can be used for crafting, cutting things on a cutting board and to harvest straw from grass.
tetra.module.sword/knife.name: Knife
tetra.module.sword/knife.description: A knife blade, it can be used for crafting, cutting things on a cutting board and to harvest straw from grass.
tetra.variant.strap1/rope.description: A rope strap that can be used to hang an item off the belt, allowing quick access to a frequently used tool or weapon.
tetra.variant.strap2/rope.description: Two rope straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
tetra.variant.strap3/rope.description: Three rope straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
tetra.variant.strap4/rope.description: Four rope straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
